group_1.textRight: Good morning.@Did you sleep well last night?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, good morning to you.@I had a 100% perfectly good sleep.

group_1.textRight: I have some errands to run,@so I will be going to Minaminagi.

group_1.textLeft: Alright.

group_1.textRight: If something happens, please@don't hesitate to call me.
And if Mikage happens to come over,@there are sweets up on the shelf.

group_1.textLeft: Alright.

group_1.textRight: Also, if you do happen to go out,@please remember to lock up on your way out.

group_1.textLeft: I've got it.
I am not a child, so there is no need@to repeat this every time.

group_1.textRight: Forgive me, I should know better@with a 100% scorer here.
I'm off.

group_1.textLeft: You're making fun of me...

group_1.textCenter: While I have some time off, I want to investigate@where Papa is and get everything I have organized.

group_1.textRight: Sorry for the intrusiooon.
Huh? Where's Rabitan?

group_1.textLeft: She is out running an errand.

group_1.textRight: That sooo...

group_1.textLeft: But we do have some sweets ready.

group_1.textRight: [chara:103801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Really?! Yaaay!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, what is that bag for?

group_1.textRight: Ah, right, I gotta do this.

group_1.textLeft: Your homework for school?
How nice of you to come into someone's home@to eat their sweets and do your homework.

group_1.textRight: It's not homework.@It's papers for my field trip.

group_1.textLeft: Goodness, that sounds so nostalgic to me.@I used to go on field trips as well.

group_1.textRight: We're going to lots of places,@so I have to get ready,
'cause I'm the group leader!

group_1.textLeft: Another wave of nostalgia.@I, too, was a group leader.
Though I also didn't do well to@prepare everything I needed.
Mikage, does your school give a lot of work@to the group leaders?

group_1.textRight: I just like doing it.
The group leader's got to be reliable, right?

group_1.textLeft: You're absolutely right.
If the group leader does a poor job preparing,@everything will be a mess once you get there.

group_1.textRight: Yep!
That's why I'm gonna do my best@so everyone can have lots of fuuun!

group_1.textLeft: How wonderful!@You're already fit to be a leader!

group_1.textCenter: I can hardly believe this is coming from@someone that got a 100%.
Children and their parents can be@so different, can't they?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103701:effect_shake]...*Sniff*...

group_1.textRight: [chara:103801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?! Nayutan?! What's wrong with you@all of a sudden?!

group_1.textLeft: Hearing you talk about this has just@made me think of myself...!
It is just as you said, Mikage:
If the group leader is not reliable,@the members won't have fun.
And in this home, the group leader is...@me...

group_1.textRight: That's right, 'cause this is your house.

group_1.textLeft: But I am not reliable at all!
In the first place, Rabi's official@employer is Papa,
and Rabi also admires him...

group_1.textCenter: Your father is so calm and collected.
Does Rabi really enjoy serving a person like me?
Does she have fun working as a servant...?
No, I'm sure she finds no enjoyment in it.
With the way things are, Rabi must find living@with me to be sheer torment!
A difference in character...that's it.@That may be the most accurate expression.
But if you start measuring out character,
then I would have to say Lady Touka is a genius.

group_1.textLeft: Character!
I need to attain the same calm and collected@character as Papa...!

group_1.textRight: Character...?

group_1.textLeft: If I don't, I am certain Rabi's disdain@for me will only grow,
and this family will fall apart...!
